Description.div: Specify the pricing rule to be created, modified or deleted. PricingRuleKey or CouponKey or combination of OrganizationCode and PricingRuleName or combaination of OrganizationCode and CouponID can be specified to identify a pricing rule.

div.p: The default value for this flag is Y. When set to N, if the adjustment the rule applies is greater than the line items unit price, the adjustment will be reduced to be the unitprice of the line item.

When this flag is Y the prorated adjustment will be spread across the target and trigger items. This flag is only supported for Combination rules that have TargetItemDeterminationRule set to either HIGH_PRICED_ITEM, LOW_PRICED_ITEM or SAME_LOW_PRICE_ITEM. This flag takes precedence over the DistributeAdjustment flag. This flag also takes precedence over the system rule " Distribute non-uniform item adjustment across the lines for the same item "

Validation.Condition: if ApplyProratedAdjustment is set to Y and the rule is not a combination rule or TargetItemDeterminationRule is not HIGH_PRICED_ITEM, LOW_PRICED_ITEM or SAME_LOW_PRICE_ITEM

Error.Description: ApplyProratedAdjustment is only supported for Combination rules that have TargetItemDeterminationRule set to HIGH_PRICED_ITEM, LOW_PRICED_ITEM or SAME_LOW_PRICE_ITEM

Description.div: Indicates whether exclusion target category and attributes should be evaluated as "AND" or "OR" condition when evaluating rule. Default value is N.
Indicates whether exclusion trigger category and attributes should be evaluated as "AND" or "OR" condition when evaluating rule. Default value is N.
Indicates whether inclusion target category and attributes should be evaluated as "AND" or "OR" condition when evaluating rule. Default value is N.
Indicates whether inclusion trigger category and attributes should be evaluated as "AND" or "OR" condition when evaluating rule. Default value is N.

The carrier service availed for transporting the order. Applicable only for RuleCategory
SHIPPING else it is discarded.
CarrierServiceCode is passed and it is not a valid carrier service.

div.p:
Specifies a common trigger quantity that all trigger criteria - attributes, categories, and items - will count towards. Valid for Order total rules and Combination rules. If the quantity of any combination of items from any of the trigger criteria matches the CommonTriggerQuantity, the rule will be executed.
When this quantity is passed, individual quantities for trigger items are not used. Quantity passed in PricingRuleItem, PricingRuleCategory, or PricingRuleAttributeValue elements will be ignored; this quantity will be set to null internally.

Validation.Condition: If CommonTriggerQuantity is passed and is not 0, and EnableMixNMatchItems is not passed as Y or ItemOperatorCode is not passed as ANY_ITEM.

Error.Description: CommonTriggerQuantity is only valid when EnableMixNMatchItems='Y' and ItemOperatorCode='ANY_ITEM'.

Description.div: Indicates, Trigger Exclusions are copied to Target Exclusions. This flag is valid for Order total rules, Ship total rules and Combination rules. For other rules this flag is ignored. For Order total rule and Ship total rule, this flag's default value is Y. For Combination rule this flag's default value is N.

Indicates, Trigger Inclusions are copied to Target Inclusions. Default is N. This flag is valid for Order total rules and Combination rules. For other rules this flag is ignored. Shipping Total rule resets the flag CopyTriggerInclusionsToTargetInclusions value to N when value of CopyTriggerInclusionsToTargetInclusions flag is passed as Y. While copying trigger Inclusion to Target Inclusions, if there exists target Exclusion for the same criteria then target will remain the same as exclusion. Value of Quantity attribute will not be copied to Target criteria.

Currency in which this rule generates adjustments. Mandatory when rule can generate absolute adjustments, i.e. if any of the PricingRuleAction has AdjustmentType as ABSOLUTE or FLAT_FEE and not otherwise.
Currency is not valid.
Currency is void and rule can generate absolute adjustments.
This option limits the number of times that a pricing rule or coupon can be used by a single customer.

div.p: When the flag is Y the target items will be grouped together as a combination (the same way triggers are treated) and the discount will be applied to all the items that make the combination. For example a rule like the following can be created: Buy 2 of A and 3 of B, get $10 off 3 C and 2 D. The $10 discount will be applied to 3 instances of C and 2 instances of D (making the total discount $50). The discount is applied to each target combination for each trigger combination or for each reference applied to the order.

Validation.Condition: if DiscountAllCombinationItems=Y and DistributeAdjustment=Y or TargetItemDetermination=ALL_ITEMS or ADJUSTMENT_TYPE=FIXED_LINE_PRICE

Error.Description: Invalid configuration for DiscountAllCombinationItems. DiscountAllCombinationItems=Y is not support for Fixed Price rule, actions with TargetItemDetermination=ALL_ITEMS, or DistributeAdjustment=Y

div.p:
Boolean indicating if the rule adjustments should be distributed to lines or not.
When this flag is Y, the calculated discount is distributed among the qualified items. This flag is ignored for FIXED_LINE_PRICE and Shipping surcharge rule. Default value is N. Note: no exception will be thrown for FIXED_LINE_PRICE and Shipping surcharge rule and the value for DistributeAdjustment is null for these cases.

When the flag is Y the target items will be grouped together as a combination (the same way triggers are treated) and the discount will be distributed across the items in the combination. For example a rule like the following can be created: Buy 2 of A and 3 of B, get $10 off 3 C and 2 D. The $10 discount will be distributed across 3 instances of C and 2 instances of D. The discount is applied to each target combination for each trigger combination or for each reference applied to the order.

Validation.Condition: if DistributeAdjustmentAcrossCombo=Y and ADJUSTMENT_TYPE is not ABSOLUTE

Error.Description: Rules that have DistributeAdjustmentAcrossCombo=Y must have AdjustmentType ABSOLUTE

div.p:
Indicates that discount can be applied in the scenario where the combinations can not satisfied by single item, but can be satisfied by including Items which belongs to same category or having same attribute values defined in the rule. Default value is null.
When this flag is enabled for Quantity rules and WHEN_TO_APPLY=SINGLE_ITEM, then field TargetItemDeterminationRule value is used for selecting to which item adjustment should be applied. If the TargetItemDeterminationRule value is null, this value will be defaulted to HIGH_PRICED_ITEM. This flag is not applicable for getItemPrice API. Note: Item aggregated quantity will not be distributed among the rule's criteria to satisfy the criteria condition. Default value is N

Description.div:
After this date the rule is not active. Mandatory when Operation is Create and not otherwise.
EndDateActive must be passed when Operation is Create .
EndDateActive is modified to void.
EndDateActive is on or before StartDateActive.
If not void indicates that the rule is applicable till this time.

The ExclusivityId this rule belongs to. For example RETAILER, VENDOR or MANUFACTURE. If no Id is set then the string 'DEFAULT' is used
All Order Total rules and Shipping Total Discount rules must be placed within the same Id. During Exclusivity processing all rules with RuleType set to ORDER_TOTAL will be treated as being in the same ExclusivityId even if the ExclusivityId for each ORDER_TOTAL rule is different.

The Exclusivity Type for this rule.
If no exclusivity type is set then type ALL is assumed.
Existing Coupon rules that have IsExclusive set to 'Y' will be treated as RULE_TYPE_ITEM if the ExclusivityType is not set.
Pricing rules that have RuleType set to ORDER_TOTAL and ExclusivityType set to RULE_TYPE_ITEM will be treated as having ExclusivityType set to RULE_TYPE_ORDER.
If ExclusivityType is not one of the valid values listed above.

Indicates that rule is not applicable if manual adjustments or manual rule adjustments are already applied at a line or order. An item level rule with IgnoreRuleOnManualAdjustment set to Y is not applied if any of the lines that the rule applicable on has manual adjustments. An order level rule with IgnoreRuleOnManualAdjustment set to Y is not applied if the order has manual adjustments applied. Default value is N
If both IsManualRule and IgnoreRuleOnManualAdjustment are set to Y .

If set indicates that the rule should not be fired if the line item's unit price is locked. The line item can be the target or the rule trigger. Applicable only for rules that are item targeted, like combination and item quantity rules. Default Value is N.
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Friday. Default value is N.
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Monday. Default value is N.
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Saturday. Default value is N.
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Sunday. Default value is N.
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Thursday. Default value is N.
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Tuesday. Default value is N.
If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Wednesday. Default value is N.
Indicates whether the rule is custom or not. If set to 'Y', the pricing rule will allow multiple target items and multiple actions. Default value is N.

Indicates whether the rule is a free gift rule or not. Default value is N.
IsFreeGiftRule is set to Y and the Rule has PricingRulePriceTypeTriggers or PricingRulePriceTypeTargets

Indicates whether this pricing rule is a manually applied adjustment rule or not. This flag is considered only during rule creation and ignored when passed during rule modification. A manual pricing rule is suggested by the pricing service based on contents or total of the order, which then again should be specified with the amount of adjustment to be applied against the order. Default value is N.
Coupon has IsManualRule as Y .
If both IsManualRule and IgnoreRuleOnManualAdjustment are set to Y .
If IsManualRule is Y and RuleCategory is SHIPPING .
If IsManualRule is Y and AdjustmentType for PricingRuleAction is FIXED_LINE_PRICE.
If IsManualRule is Y and RuleType is GLOBAL_EXCLUSION.
If IsManualRule is Y and RuleType is any of QUANTITY, COMBINATION or SURCHARGE.

div.p:
If this attribute is Y, then the discount is not provided instantly(The Discounts from this rule will not be considered when calculating the qualifying amount for other order total pricing Rules).If this attribute is not passed,PricingRules are automatically considered as instant discount rules.
Note: This flag is not applicable for getItemPrice API.

Description.div:
Indicates how the trigger for the rule is evaluated.
Mandatory for combination rule and when Operation is Create and not otherwise. In case of Order total and Shipment Order total rules, ItemOperatorCode is defaulted to "ANY_ITEM" when trigger inclusions exists for the rule.
ItemOperatorCode must be passed when Operation is Create .

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

Pricing organization to which this rule belongs. Mandatory when Operation is Create .
OrganizationCode must be passed when Operation is Create .
OrganizationCode is not valid.
This option limits the number of times that a pricing rule or coupon can be used in total, by all customers
The rule is applicable for this Payment Type.

This attribute is used by SBC application. It is a free text field. This attribute is not used by any pricing api internally.
Values used for this attribute are
Attribute
Category
Product
Basic

Name of the pricing rule. Mandatory if the rule is not a coupon and the Operation is Create and not otherwise. PricingRuleName is defaulted to CouponID if the rule is a coupon and PricingRuleName is not passed.
PricingRuleName must be passed if it is not a coupon and the Operation is Create .
PricingRuleName is modified to void.

Indicates the status of the rule. It is defaulted to INACTIVE when Operation is Create and not passed in the input.
PricingStatus is passed and not a valid value.

Used for Exclusivity processing. If set, the larger the value, the higher the precedence. For example a rule with a priority of 200 is chosen over a rule with priority 100.
The priority can be set to 0 indicating no priority. When no priority is set for any of the rules under consideration, the rule that gives the best discount is the rule chosen.
Multiple rules can have the same priority. When more than one rule has the same priority the rule that gives the best discount is the rule chosen.
Setting priority for a rule that has an ExclusivityType of ALL has no effect.
Attribute can be used to control whether the cache is updated or not. If the value N the cache will not be refreshed. The default value is Y.

Indicates the category to which the rule belongs. Mandatory when Operation is Create and not otherwise.
RuleCategory must be passed when Operation is Create .
Price Types are only supported for RuleCategory PRICING.

Indicates the type of the rule. Mandatory when Operation is Create and not otherwise.
RuleType must be passed when Operation is Create .

Seller organization to which this rule belongs. By default SellerOrganizationCode is defaulted to the pricing organization.
OrganizationCode is not valid.
SellerOrganizationCode is not seller organization.

Date from which the rule is active. Mandatory when Operation is Create and not otherwise.
StartDateActive must be passed when Operation is Create .
StartDateActive is modified to void.
StartDateActive is on or after EndDateActive.
If not void indicates that the rule is applicable from this time.

Stores information about the coupon. The coupon behavior is defined by the pricing rule associated with it.
An existing pricing rule is being modified to a coupon.
Coupons are not allowed for GLOBAL_EXCLUSION rules.
Format of generated part of unique code.

Unique identifier of a coupon. Mandatory if rule is for a coupon and the Operation is Create and not otherwise.
CouponID must be passed if rule is for a coupon and the Operation is Create .
CouponID is modified to void.

Specifies whether unique codes will be generated for the coupon definition
When GenerateUniqueCodes='Y' and Attributes CodeFormat and/or NumberOfCodesToGenerate do not have valid values
When GenerateUniqueCodes='Y' and no active coupon policy for the organization exists
When GenerateUniqueCodes='Y' and more than one active coupon policy for the organization exists
When GenerateUniqueCodes='Y' and the values for CodeFormat and/or NumberOfCodesToGenerate are not sufficient to create the number of codes requested
Indicates associated unique codes are imported from an external system.

deprecated - this attribute should no longer be used. Instead the PricingRule attributes ExclusivityId and ExclusivityType should be set.
Indicates whether the coupon is exclusive or not. Either a single exclusive coupon or multiple non-exclusive coupons can be applied on an order.
Specifies the number of unique codes to generate.

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing price types are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

This table maintains information about the Price Types that trigger the rule. This is used when determining a total for the rule criteria.
The specified price type does not exist for the organization.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing price types are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

This table maintains information about the Price Types that the rule targets. This is used when determining a total for the rule application.
The specified price type does not exist for the organization.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

If DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing excluded records are removed. If DeleteExcludedRecord is not passed or DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing included records are removed. If DeleteIncludedRecord is not passed or DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing quantity tiers are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

This table maintains information about the item attribute values of the items on which the pricing rule adjustments are targeted. Targeting by item attribute is allowed only for item quantity and surcharge rule types of pricing category only
There is no attribute for passed TargetAttributeID, TargetAttributeGroupID and TargetAttributeDomainID.
The value of the attribute specified is not a constant, it is derived, computed or referenced. Pricing rule doesn't support these Target attributes.
Passed TargetAttributeValue or TargetAttributeIntegerValue or TargetAttributeDoubleValue is not valid for the attribute.
Rule Target Attributes are not allowed for GLOBAL_EXCLUSION rules.
Indicates all the target attribute values with same group Id will be executed together.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments. Accepted values INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
Only EXCLUDE Targets are not allowed for Rule. At least one INCLUDE target condition should be there for Combination, Item quantity and Shipping sur-charge rules.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

This Quantity is applicable for Combination pricing rules where value of WhenToApply is EACH_COMBINATION, For other cases target Quantity value will be set to void. Target Quantity will not be considered for getLowestItemPrice API call. For the inclusion targets Quantity value is defaulted to 1. For the exclusion targets Quantity value is defaulted to void.
Target Quantity should be same for all the inclusion target criteria.
Target Quantity can not be more than TargetOccurrenceLimit.
Discountable Quantity should be a positive non zero value or void for the pricing rule.

Validation.Condition: Rule Target Items are not allowed for GLOBAL_EXCLUSION rules.

Error.Description: API does not accept Rule Targets in the input for GLOBAL_EXCLUSION rules.

Description.div: If DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing excluded records are removed. If DeleteExcludedRecord is not passed or DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing included records are removed. If DeleteIncludedRecord is not passed or DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments. Accepted values INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
Only EXCLUDE Targets are not allowed for Rule. At least one INCLUDE target condition should be there for Combination, Item quantity and Shipping sur-charge rules.

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing quantity tiers are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments. Accepted values INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
Only EXCLUDE Targets are not allowed for Rule. At least one INCLUDE target condition should be there for Combination, Item quantity and Shipping sur-charge rules.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

This Quantity is applicable for Combination pricing rules where value of WhenToApply is EACH_COMBINATION, For other cases target Quantity value will be set to void. Target Quantity will not be considered for getLowestItemPrice API call. For the inclusion targets Quantity value is defaulted to 1. For the exclusion targets Quantity value is defaulted to void.
Target Quantity should be same for all the inclusion target criteria.
Target Quantity can not be more than TargetOccurrenceLimit.
Discountable Quantity should be a positive non zero value or void for the pricing rule.

If DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing excluded records are removed. If DeleteExcludedRecord is not passed or DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing included records are removed. If DeleteIncludedRecord is not passed or DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing quantity tiers are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

This table maintains information about the categories of the items on which the pricing rule adjustments are defined.
Invalid category passed for trigger.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments. Accepted values INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
Only EXCLUDE Targets are not allowed for Rule. At least one INCLUDE target condition should be there for Combination, Item quantity and Shipping sur-charge rules.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

Quantity of the Category.
Invalid quantity for pricing rule Category condition.

Validation.Condition: Rule Target Categories are not allowed for GLOBAL_EXCLUSION rules.

Error.Description: API does not accept Rule Targets in the input for GLOBAL_EXCLUSION rules.

Description.div: If DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing excluded records are removed. If DeleteExcludedRecord is not passed or DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing included records are removed. If DeleteIncludedRecord is not passed or DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing quantity tiers are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

This table maintains information about the categories of the items on which the pricing rule adjustments are applied.
Invalid category passed for target.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments. Accepted values INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
Only EXCLUDE Targets are not allowed for Rule. At least one INCLUDE target condition should be there for Combination, Item quantity and Shipping sur-charge rules.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

This Quantity is applicable for Combination pricing rules where value of WhenToApply is EACH_COMBINATION, For other cases target Quantity value will be set to void. Target Quantity will not be considered for getLowestItemPrice API call. For the inclusion targets Quantity value is defaulted to 1. For the exclusion targets Quantity value is defaulted to void.
Target Quantity should be same for all the inclusion target criteria.
Target Quantity can not be more than TargetOccurrenceLimit.
Discountable Quantity should be a positive non zero value or void for the pricing rule.

If DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing excluded records are removed. If DeleteExcludedRecord is not passed or DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing included records are removed. If DeleteIncludedRecord is not passed or DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing quantity tiers are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

This table maintains information about the item attribute values of the items on which the pricing rule adjustments are defined. Trigger by item attribute is allowed all types of rules except Quantity and Shipping Surchage rules.
There is no attribute for passed TriggerAttributeID, TriggerAttributeGroupID and TriggerAttributeDomainID.
The value of the attribute specified is not a constant, it is derived, computed or referenced. Pricing rule doesn't support these attributes.
Passed TriggerAttributeValue or TriggerAttributeIntegerValue or TriggerAttributeDoubleValue is not valid for the attribute.
Trigger quantity should be same with in an attribute group.
Indicates all the trigger attributes with same group Id will be executed together.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments. Accepted values INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
Only EXCLUDE Targets are not allowed for Rule. At least one INCLUDE target condition should be there for Combination, Item quantity and Shipping sur-charge rules.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

Quantity of the Attribute value.
Invalid quantity for pricing rule Attribute value condition.

If DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing excluded records are removed. If DeleteExcludedRecord is not passed or DeleteExcludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

If DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as Y , the existing included records are removed. If DeleteIncludedRecord is not passed or DeleteIncludedRecord is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments. Accepted values INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
Only EXCLUDE Targets are not allowed for Rule. At least one INCLUDE target condition should be there for Combination, Item quantity and Shipping sur-charge rules.

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing quantity tiers are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

Indicates whether certain items should be included or excluded from adjustments. Accepted values INCLUDE and EXCLUDE.
Only EXCLUDE Targets are not allowed for Rule. At least one INCLUDE target condition should be there for Combination, Item quantity and Shipping sur-charge rules.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

Quantity of the item.
Invalid quantity for pricing rule item condition.

Validation.Condition: Pricing Rule Actions are not allowed for GLOBAL_EXCLUSION rules.

Error.Description: Pricing Rule Actions are not allowed for GLOBAL_EXCLUSION rules.

Description.div:
Maximum absolute adjustment that can be provided for this pricing rule action within a transaction. This value will be ignored for Manual rules.
MaxAbsoluteAdjustment is not supported when AdjustmentType is FIXED_LINE_PRICE
Passed MaxAbsoluteAdjustment must be set to the same value for all actions.
MaxAbsoluteAdjustment is not valid for Order Total rule with AdjustmentType=ABSOLUTE or for Shipping total rule with any AdjustmentType.

div.p: QualifierAmount attribute is used as promotion qualifier. This attribute work along with QualifierAmountType.

Validation.Condition: QualifierAmount is not supported when QualifierAmountType is not defined.

Error.Description: QualifierAmountType is mandatory when QualifierAmount is specified and viceversa.

div.p: QualifierAmountType attribute is used as promotion qualifier. This attribute work along with QualifierAmount as described below. In case of QualifierAmountType=TRIGGER_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE, trigger quantity not considered when comparing total extended price with QualifierAmount.

Validation.Condition: QualifierAmountType is not supported when QualifierAmount is not defined.

Error.Description: QualifierAmountType is mandatory when QualifierAmount is specified and viceversa.

Validation.Condition: QualifierAmountType must be same for all actions with in a pricing rule.

Error.Description: QualifierAmountType must be same for all actions with in a pricing rule.

Validation.Condition: Invalid QualifierAmountType. For Quantity and Shipping Sur-charge rules allowed values are TARGET_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE and TARGET_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE. For other types of rules allowed values are TRIGGER_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE, TRIGGER_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE, TARGET_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE and TARGET_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE.

Invalid QualifierAmountType for Order total rule with ABSOLUTE DiscountType or for Shipping total rule. For Order total rule with ABSOLUTE DiscountType or for Shipping total rule, allowed values for QualifierAmountType are TRIGGER_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE and TRIGGER_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE..

Error.Description: Invalid QualifierAmountType for order total rule with ABSOLUTE DiscountType or for Shipping total rule.

Description.div: If Reset is passed as Y , the existing quantity tiers are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.

Specifies, on which target item the action should be applied. Applicable Values are: LOW_PRICED_ITEM, HIGH_PRICED_ITEM, SAME_LOW_PRICE_ITEM and ALL_ITEMS. used when defining combination rules with target as All items in order, but excludes certain items.
If the value for TargetItemDeterminationRule differs across action tiers
TargetItemDeterminationRule should be empty or ALL_ITEMS for Order total rule with ABSOLUTE DiscountType or for Shipping total rule.
The value SAME_LOW_PRICE_ITEM is supported only for Combination rules.

Adjustment to be applied as part of this action.
If Adjustment is void and not a manual adjustment rule.
For a manual adjustment rule Adjustment and MaximumManualAdjustment are null.
For a manual adjustment rule if abs(Adjustment) > abs(MaximumManualAdjustment).
For a manual adjustment rule if Adjustment < 0 when MaximumManualAdjustment > 0.
For a manual adjustment rule if Adjustment > 0 when MaximumManualAdjustment < 0.
If AdjustmentType is FIXED_LINE_PRICE and the adjustment is a negative number

Indicates the type of adjustment. Mandatory for every action. Defaulted for SURCHARGE type of rule to ABSOLUTE
if not passed in the input.
RuleCategory RuleType AdjustmentType
ABSOLUTE
PERCENT
FLAT_FEE
FIXED_LINE_PRICE
ABSOLUTE_TOTAL
FLAT_FEE_TOTAL
PRICING COMBINATION Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed
PRICING ITEM_QUANTITY Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed
PRICING ORDER_TOTAL Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed
SHIPPING ORDER_TOTAL Allowed Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed
SHIPPING SURCHARGE Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed Not Allowed
SHIPPING ITEM_QUANTITY Allowed Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Allowed Allowed
Passed AdjustmentType is not valid for the rule.
Passed AdjustmentType is not the same for every action. All actions need to be the same type when FIXED_LINE_PRICE
Note: A FLAT_FEE shipping action is applied only in cases where it generates discounts.

Indicates that adjustments should be applied only to the remainder of the transaction. Default value is N.
If the value for ApplyAdjustmentToRemainder differs across action tiers
The target and trigger criteria should be same if ApplyAdjustmentToRemainder is enabled.
ApplyAdjustmentToRemainder is not supported when AdjustmentType is FIXED_LINE_PRICE.

Charge Category associated with the rule action.
If ChargeCategory is passed and it is not valid.
If ChargeCategory is defined for discount and the rule action generates uplift.
If ChargeCategory is defined for uplift and the rule action generates discount.
If ChargeCategory is not billable and the rule action generates discount or uplift.
NOTE:This Rule can be overriden at an enterprise level by enabling the business rule provided "YPM_IS_NONBILLABLE_PRICING_RULE_ENABLED".

Charge Name associated with the rule action.
A valid ChargeCategory is passed and ChargeName is not valid.

Maximum absolute adjustment that can be provided for this pricing rule action within a transaction. This value will be ignored for Manual rules.
MaxAbsoluteAdjustment is not supported when AdjustmentType is FIXED_LINE_PRICE
Passed MaxAbsoluteAdjustment must be set to the same value for all actions.
MaxAbsoluteAdjustment is not valid for Order Total rules and Shipping total rules when AdjustmentType=ABSOLUTE.
MaxAbsoluteAdjustment and Adjustment both should have positive or both should have negative values.

The maximum adjustment that can be applied as part of this manual rule action.
For a manual adjustment rule Adjustment and MaximumManualAdjustment are null.
For a manual adjustment rule if abs(MaximumManualAdjustment) < abs(Adjustment).
For a manual adjustment rule if MaximumManualAdjustment > 0 when Adjustment < 0.
For a manual adjustment rule if MaximumManualAdjustment < 0 when Adjustment > 0.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Creates a new record if it does not exist, or modifies an existing record if it does.
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.
Delete - Deletes an existing record.
The default behavior is Manage .

div.p: QualifierAmount attribute is used as promotion qualifier. This attribute work along with QualifierAmountType.

Validation.Condition: QualifierAmount is not supported when QualifierAmountType is not defined.

Error.Description: QualifierAmountType is mandatory when QualifierAmount is specified and viceversa.

Validation.Condition: For order total rules either QualifierAmount or OrderTotal must have same values across all action tiers. For other rules either QualifierAmount or Quantity must have same values across all actions.

Error.Description: Incase Order Total rule QualifierAmount and OrderTotal both have different values across action tiers.Or for other rules QualifierAmount and Quantity have different values across action tiers.

div.p: QualifierAmountType attribute is used as promotion qualifier. This attribute work along with QualifierAmount as described below.

Validation.Condition: QualifierAmountType is not supported when QualifierAmount is not defined.

Error.Description: QualifierAmountType is mandatory when QualifierAmount is specified and viceversa.

Validation.Condition: QualifierAmountType must be same for all actions with in a pricing rule.

Error.Description: QualifierAmountType must be same for all actions with in a pricing rule.

Validation.Condition: Invalid QualifierAmountType. For Quantity and Shipping Sur-charge rules allowed values are TARGET_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE and TARGET_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE. For other types of rules allowed values are TRIGGER_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE, TRIGGER_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE, TARGET_MINIMUM_TOTAL_EXTENDED_PRICE and TARGET_MINIMUM_UNIT_PRICE.

Description.div:
Specifies, on which target item the action should be applied. Applicable Values are: LOW_PRICED_ITEM, HIGH_PRICED_ITEM and ALL_ITEMS. used when defining combination rules with target as All items in order, but excludes certain items.
If the value for TargetItemDeterminationRule differs across action tiers

The value will be considered as the maximum number of times a particular discount can be applied in a transaction.
Passed TargetOccurrenceLimit must be set to the same value for all actions when AdjustmentType is set to FIXED_LINE_PRICE
If TargetOccurrenceLimit is not set to the highest Quantity or a multiple of the quantities for each action
If WhenToApply is set to SPECIFIC_NUMBER and TargetOccurrenceLimit is not set
TargetOccurrenceLimit is not allowed for Order total rule with ABSOLUTE DiscountType or for Shipping total rule.

Indicates how to apply the action. Mandatory for every action. Defaulted for SURCHARGE type of rule and manual item level rules to ALL and ORDER_TOTAL type of rule to SINGLE_ITEM
if not passed in the input.
RuleType IsManualRule WhenToApply
SINGLE_ITEM
ALL
EACH_COMBINATION
SPECIFIC_NUMBER
COMBINATION No Allowed Allowed Allowed Allowed
COMBINATION Yes Not Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Allowed
ITEM_QUANTITY No Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Allowed
ITEM_QUANTITY Yes Not Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Allowed
ORDER_TOTAL Yes or No Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Allowed
SURCHARGE No Not Allowed Allowed Not Allowed Allowed
Passed WhenToApply is not valid for the type of rule.
Passed WhenToApply must be set to the same value for all actions when AdjustmentType is set to FIXED_LINE_PRICE
WhenToApply=SPECIFIC_NUMBER is not allowed for Order total rule with ABSOLUTE DiscountType or for Shipping total rule.
If Reset is passed as Y , the old records are removed and replaced with the new ones. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the deltas are applied.
Valid value is Delete . Set Operation = " Delete " to delete the entity.

If Reset is passed as Y , the existing price lists are removed and replaced with the new ones passed in the input. If Reset is not passed or Reset is passed as N , only the changes specified in the input are applied.
This table maintains information about price lists that should be excluded by the pricing rule.

Operation to perform
Valid Values:
Manage - Adds a new price list to exclude.
Create - Adds a new price list to exclude
Modify - Change values in an existing entry.
Delete - Deletes an existing price list from the exclusion list.
The default behavior is Manage .

the price list header key of the price list to exclude
Either PricelistHeaderKey or PricelistName is not defined.
Price list does not exist for the passed PricelistHeaderKey or PricelistName.

the name of the price list to exclude
Either PricelistHeaderKey or PricelistName is not defined.
Price list does not exist for the passed PricelistHeaderKey or PricelistName.

This table maintains information about the order attribute filters on which the pricing rule selection are defined.
There is no attribute for passed OrderAttributeKey, OrderAttributeID, OrderAttributeGroupID or OrderAttributeDomainID.
There is no attribute corresponding to the OrderAttributeKey or OrderAttributeID.
None of OrderAttributeTextValue or OrderAttributeNumberValue or OrderAttributeMinValue or OrderAttributeMaxValue or OrderAttributeBooleanValue are passed, or only one of OrderAttributeMinValue or OrderAttributeMaxValue are passed.
Only one of OrderAttributeTextValue or OrderAttributeNumberValue or OrderAttributeBooleanValue or OrderAttributeMinValue and OrderAttributeMaxValue may be passed.
Primary key for the YFS_ATTRIBUTE table.

If this is passed, OrderAttributeDomain, OrderAttributeGroup, and OrderAttributeID values are ignored.
Either AttributeKey or OrderAttributeDomainID, OrderAttributeGroupID, and OrderAttributeID must be passed.
Indicates all the filter order attributes with same group Id will correspond to one "AND" condition.

Boolean value that the order attribute must have to meet this condition.
OrderAttributeBooleanValue is set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of non-boolean datatype, or it is set to something besides "Y" or "N".
OrderAttributeBooleanValue is not set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of boolean datatype.

Domain the order attribute belongs to.
Neither AttributeKey nor OrderAttributeDomainID are passed.

Attribute group attribute belongs to.
Neither AttributeKey nor OrderAttributeGroupID are passed.

Identifier for the attribute to be used in the filter condition.
Neither AttributeKey nor OrderAttributeID are passed.

Values must be less than this value to satisfy this filter condition.
OrderAttributeMaxValue is set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of non-numeric datatype.
OrderAttributeDecimal, OrderAttributeMaxValue, and OrderAttributeMinValue are not set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of number datatype.

The minimum value that will satisfy this filter condition, inclusive.
OrderAttributeMinValue is set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of non-numeric datatype.
OrderAttributeDecimal, OrderAttributeMaxValue, and OrderAttributeMinValue are not set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of number datatype.

Decimal value that the order attribute must have to meet this condition.
OrderAttributeNumberValue is set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of non-numeric datatype.
OrderAttributeNumberValue, OrderAttributeMaxValue, and OrderAttributeMinValue are not set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of number datatype.

Text condition for attribute filter.
OrderAttributeTextValue is set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of non-text datatype.
OrderAttributeTextValue is not set, but OrderAttributeID corresponds to an attribute of text datatype.
Primary key for the YPM_PRICING_RULE_ORDER_ATTR table.
